```{r}
library("seasonal") #Arima X13-Seats
library("mFilter") #Filtro HP
```
```{r}
available_series(language = c("en", "br"))
```
```{r}
PIB = ipeadata("BM12_PIB12",language = "br")
PIB <- data.frame(data = PIB$date, valor = PIB$value)
ts_do_PIB <- ts(PIB$valor,start = c(1990,1), frequency = 12)
decomp <- decompose(ts_do_PIB)
PIB["valor sem saz"] = ts_do_PIB - decomp$seasonal
```

```{r}
plot(PIB$data,PIB$valor,"l", xlab = "ano", ylab = "valor do gas")
lines(PIB$data,PIB$`valor sem saz`,"l", xlab = "ano", ylab = "valor do gas", col = "blue")

```
```{r}
modelo_sazonal = seas(ts_do_PIB)
plot(modelo_sazonal)

air_x13 = predict(modelo_sazonal)
PIB["valor arima x13"] <- air_x13
```
```{r}
ts_do_M2 <- ts(M2NS$M2NS,start = c(2019,7), frequency = 12)
decomp_M2 <- decompose(ts_do_M2)
M2NS["M2NS sem saz"] = ts_do_M2 - decomp_M2$seasonal
```
```{r}
plot(M2NS$DATE,M2NS$M2NS,"l", xlab = "data", ylab = "valor do M2")
lines(M2NS$DATE,M2NS$`M2NS sem saz`,"l", xlab = "data", ylab = "valor do M2", col = "blue")
```
```{r}
modelo_sazonalM2 = seas(ts_do_M2)
plot(modelo_sazonalM2)

air_x13M2 = predict(modelo_sazonalM2)
M2NS["M2NS arima x13"] <- air_x13M2
```
